thread.title: Barack Obama Takes Daughter Malia On a Trip to New York City (PHOTOS)
thread.title_full: Barack Obama Takes Daughter Malia On a Trip to New York City (PHOTOS)

author: Zakiya Jamal
title: Barack Obama Takes Daughter Malia On a Trip to New York City (PHOTOS)
text:
February 25, 2017 by Zakiya Jamal 0 Shares Advertisement 
Former President Barack Obama is finally back in the states. 
Returning from his island vacation, he’s now enjoying in trip to New York City with his eldest daughter, Malia. A post shared by Emilio Vitolo (@emiliovitolo) on Feb 23, 2017 at 6:55pm PST 
The father-daughter duo were first spotted having dinner on Thursday night at Emilio’s Ballato, an Italian restaurant in Soho. President Obama leaving 160 5th ave just now pic.twitter.com/kowtqnif9W Allan Smith (@akarl_smith) February 24, 2017 
Then on Friday, the 44th president was greeted by a large crowd and cheers, when leaving a building on Fifth Avenue with his Starbucks cup already in hand. Barack Obama and Malia Attend The Price on Broadway, Internet Freaks Out https://t.co/4nAZGRqqiK pic.twitter.com/xiJIxNoAtZ Trending on Queenic (@QueenicTrending) February 25, 2017 
Later that evening, he met back up with his 18-year-old to attend the revival of Arthur Miller’s The Price on Broadway, which stars Danny Devito and Mark Ruffalo. I cried after seeing Barack Obama outside my office off 5th Ave. Welcome back Dad. pic.twitter.com/zc0sf7q2cs Laura Naparstek (@lourgette) February 24, 2017 
New Yorkers couldn’t help but freak out over the fact that the former president was in their neighborhood and took to Twitter to share their excitement. barack obama is a good looking man, goddamn Bim Adewunmi (@bimadew) February 24, 2017 
Many people also pointed out that the 55-year-old was looking better than ever and well rested from his vacation. When you finally block America's number. pic.twitter.com/SVSNo93jol top gang thug (@tamakloeee) February 7, 2017 
He and his wife, Michelle, spent 10 days on a private island belonging to British billionaire and Virgin Group founder Richard Branson, where the former POTUS enjoyed some watersports, according to People . A post shared by Obama Family Fan Page (@obamafamily44) on Feb 24, 2017 at 4:27pm PST 
While many are still sad that he’s no longer our president, we’re happy to see that the former leader of the free world is enjoying himself and spending time with his family.
